options.name: Beginner Illusionist
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Illusion Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Reaction : Escape Artist
options.description: You move up to 2 Units without provoking Reactions. If you are Grappled, you gain a 2d4 Bonus to your Check to attempt to escape it or if you are Prone, you become upright.

options.name: Novice Illusionist
options.description: You can research Novice Level Illusion Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Mind Palace
options.description: You can use illusions to help calm your mind. When rolling on the Confusion Table, the Condition ends on you when you roll a 6 or higher instead of just an 8. Additionally, you gain +2 on Resistance Checks while Charmed. Finally, when you are Maddened and attack an Ally, you do not apply your Damage Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Vivid Imagination
options.description: You become Immune to the Afraid Condition and gain +1 Resilience

options.name: Journeyman Illusionist
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Illusion Spells, gain +5 Power and +2 Psychic Mitigation

options.name: Sleight of Hand
options.description: You can Channel Illusion Spells that require 1 Action effortlessly by using your hands to gesture instead of requiring speaking.

options.name: Reaction : Bend Light
options.description: In response to a Ray Attack striking within 4 Units of you, roll a Spell Attack. If your roll is higher than the initial Attack, you redirect the Ray to a point within 6 Units. Otherwise, reduce the Attack roll of the Ray by 1d4.

options.name: Expert Illusionist
options.description: You can research Expert Level Illusion Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Free Action : Mind Wrack
options.description: When you deal Psychic Damage to a Creature, you can force them to make a Resilience Check against half the Psychic Damage taken after Mitigation or give them your choice of the the Afraid or Stunned Condition.

options.name: Action : Will Breaker
options.description: You Target a Creature within 20 Units and erode at their will, lowering any Resistance and Resilience Checks by 1d4 until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Master Illusionist
options.description: You can research Master Level Illusion Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Illusion Spells at level 13.
